message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.NE 

The paper discusses lifelong learning, which is a subfield of machine learning. The focus is on evaluating and improving the efficiency of current lifelong learning approaches. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.CV (Computer Vision), cs.CL (Computation and Language), and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
